settings.title: Can't Wait? Give us a Call
settings.text:
Our agents are standing by to help you make the most of you scenting system.

We're available Monday-Friday from 9-5PM EST to help. Call us at +1 (754) 254-1682

settings.heading: Thank you for your interest in Hotel Collection
settings.subheading:
A member of our team will be reaching out to you soon.

You can also select a date and time below to schedule a Consultation with one of our Scenting Experts!

settings.javascript_code:
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://assets.calendly.com/assets/external/widget.js"></script>

<script>
  var url_string = window.location.href;
  var url = new URL(url_string);
  var utm_source = url.searchParams.get("utm_source");
  console.log('[UTM SOURCE]', utm_source);

  Calendly.initInlineWidget({
    url: 'https://calendly.com/hvac-scenting/30min',
    parentElement: document.getElementById('my-calendly-widget'),
    utm: {
      utmSource: utm_source,
    }
  });
</script>
